title: LesionScanNet: dual-path convolutional neural network for acute appendicitis diagnosis
details: M Hariri, A Aydın, O Sıbıç, E Somuncu, S Yılmaz… - Health Information Science …, 2025
abstract: Acute appendicitis is an abrupt inflammation of the appendix, which causes symptoms such as abdominal pain, vomiting, and fever. Computed tomography (CT) is a useful tool in accurate diagnosis of acute appendicitis; however, it causes …
